name: Ace Of Space (itch) (StarSystemStudios)
description:
Ace of Space is a spectacular space shooter with tons of explosions, power-ups and weapons. Lock and load up!

Ace of Space is a intense space survival game which is made to cater to many aspects of great space shooters including:

  • A full roster of 6 unique ships with different handing and speed.
  • A variety of weapons to choose from before each battle.
  • 3 beautiful maps which come at a small, medium and large sizes.
  • Epic boss fights for the Top Ace pilots to take on.
  • A full leveling system which will unlock you ships and weapons throughout playing.
  • Split screen and shared screen play for you and your friend to vs each other!
  • Full controller support!
  • Epic sound effects will have you feel like you are right in the action at all times!

YOU CAN GET IT ON STEAM FOR ONLY 1 DOLLAR!
